author: Special Correspondent
text:
To mark National Science Day that falls on February 28, the Nehru Children’s Cultural Association is organising a maths and science quiz for students in classes VIII and IX, a press release said.

The science quiz will be held on February 14 and prizes will be distributed on February 28, while the maths quiz will be at Vanavani School, IIT-Madras campus, from 10.30 a.m. to 1.30 p.m. on April 10. The prizes will be given away on April 26.

Students attending the maths and science workshops at Vanavani School are eligible to participate. The workshops will be held on all Saturdays and Sundays until April 26, the release said. Interested students can register. For details, contact: M.R. Sugumaran at 8144416484.
title: Maths and science quiz on February 28
